original_text: and he put them in custody in the house of the captain of the guard, in the prison where Joseph was confined.
korean_text: 그들을 친위대장의 집 안에 있는 옥에 가두니 곧 요셉이 갇힌 곳이라

sentences.original_text: and he put them in custody
in the house of the captain of the guard
in the prison where Joseph was confined
